mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_time_price (id, price, last_update_time, price_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{priceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, price, last_update_time, price_code from t_baby_time_price
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_time_price where id IN #{item}
